name: DarkModePaletteToggler
description:
Toggle easily between a light color palette and a dark one. This plugin is made to help you manage dark mode in your project without duplicating the project.

To use DarkModeToggler properly :
 1. Use the "Generate assets variants" button to transform your normal color assets (which are named) in compatible ones OR for each color asset, create a name/light and name/dark version and then use the "Reload colors" button
2. Switch between light-mode and dark-mode via the DarkModeToggler
3. Edit colors via the Adobe XD assets panel

Because of software restrictions, this plugin is not able to edit : circular gradients, repeatGrids and objects into a shape mask. It can change in the futur if these restrictions are removed.

This plugin was designed and developed by Romain Penchenat [https://romainpenchenat.com]
